EALT3.SA.summary: Electro AÃ§o Altona S.A., a casting and machining company, supplies parts in low, medium, and high carbon steel and alloys in Brazil. It offers alloyed irons for special applications, raw or machined parts, add-ons for equipment, steels and alloys resistant to abrasion, steels and alloys resistant to high temperatures, steels and alloys resistant to corrosion, alloyed irons, special alloys, and super alloys. The company serves automotive, machinery and equipment and construction, heavy transport, power generation, mining, dredging, oil and gas, offshore, and petrochemical industries. It also exports its products to approximately 25 countries. The company was formerly known as Auerbach & Werner and changed its name to Electro AÃ§o Altona S.A. in 1933. Electro AÃ§o Altona S.A. was founded in 1924 and is based in Blumenau, Brazil.
